title: Ka lal duhawm ka zahpui lo'ng
lyrics:
Ka lal duhawm ka zahpui lo'ng,
A rawngbawl hna hum nen;
A thu chawimawiin ka vawng ang,
A kraws ropuina nen.

Kraws-ah khan, kraws-ah khan,
Eng ka lo hmuh veleh
Ka thinlung sual rit phurh a lum bo ve,
Chutah rinnain mit varna ka hmu,
Tin, tunah nilengin ka lawm e.

Pathian Isua, a hming ka hria,
A hming chauh ka ring a;
Aman min timualpho lo vang,
Ka beisei thlawn lo vang.

Thu a tiam nghet, lungphun angin,
Ka thih ni thleng pawhin;
A kutah tinreng ka pe ang,
Tha takin ka vawng ang.

Ka hming hnaisailo, Pa hmaah
Isuan a tan ang a;
Van Jerusalem tharah khian,
Awmna min siam sak ang
